<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[var CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil = Class.create(); CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { type: 'CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil', CMDB_POLICY_MANAGEMENT_TASK: 'cmdb_data_management_task',
getPolicyTypeId: function() { var sysId = this.getParameter('sysId'); var gr = new GlideRecord(this.CMDB_POLICY_MANAGEMENT_TASK); gr.get(sysId); return gr.policy_id.cmdb_policy_type; },
});]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-03-29 17:52:27</sys_created_on> <sys_id>581b379dffe20110456d766cf43bf16e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="CMDB Data Manager" source="com.snc.cmdb.ci_lifecycle_manager">9a8d16342f000110d8a4d5f62799b646</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_581b379dffe20110456d766cf43bf16e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-29 18:17:31</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>424</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
